name: Cold Light (Oneiromancer)
description:
A puzzle game where you control AI, that should guide a little girl through a dark and empty dungeon.

[ AI Controls Manual ]:

  • Turn lamps on and off by clicking on them. Due to the lack of power only one lamp can be powered at a time.
  • If audio communication is not available, use [ 1 ] and [ 2 ] to blink lights to establish some sort of communication.
  • NOTE TO SELF: usually people blink once for "yes", twice for "no".

Entry for Extra Credits Game Jam with the theme "Take Care".
